item.title: Should User Account Control be disabled?
item.description:
Increasingly, as clients transition to Windows 7 or Vista, user account control issues are becoming more prevalent in Dynamics GP support, particularly with Dynamics GP Utilities. Users frequently encounter BCP utility errors after successfully launching utilities and logging in. A quick fix is to launch Dynamics GP Utilities as an administrator. While this is straightforward, I’ve observed a concerning trend of simply recommending the disabling of user account control altogether. This approach raises concerns for me...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/should-user-account-control-be-disabled/

item.title: The Wanda Vista brand expands globally
item.description:
Qian Jin, the head of the upscale hotel group Wanda Hotels & Resorts, has revealed the global growth plan for their Wanda Vista brand. Wanda Vista represents the top tier of luxury within Wanda Hotels & Resorts, designed specifically for guests who appreciate art and culture. Situated in major international cities and drawing inspiration from Eastern aesthetics, the brand focuses on providing personalized service catered to each guest’s individual requirements...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-wanda-vista-brand-expands-globally/
